attributes.action: Increase the amount of money spent on mental health facitlities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like to have the funding increased for the support of mentally ill patients.

It should be spent on improving services including on-call psychiatrists(after office hours) and crisis teams should be made 24/7 as most mentally ill patients breakdown after office hours have closed.

We need more support!
